RelatedSentence: Nyrstar has secured a three - stage financing package involving Australia 's EFIC for the redevelopment of the Port Pirie metals smelter .

Metals and mining company Nyrstar has signed a hybrid financing facility which includes guarantees from Australia 's Export Finance and Insurance Corporation ( EFIC ) , a prepayment facility and direct financing from Nyrstar for the Port Pirie metals smelter .
